title: Coach logo ID
content:

comments.content: Not as wide, but same class: [Craw Modern](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106075422/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/urw/craw_modern_bold_ot_std_urw/?sample_text=COACH&sample_size=60)
